body: --- begin forwarded text Status: U To: rah@shipwright.com From: hacker@vudu.net Date: Thu, 03 Oct 2002 06:01:38 -0700 (PDT) Subject: Re: The 3rd Annual Consult Hyperion Digital Identity Forum The guy messed up his own URL. It should be which redirects to "R. A. Hettinga" wrote: > > Dear All, > > See for more details. Speakers include > Microsoft and Liberty Alliance, UK central and local government, > law > enforcement, financial services (Egg and RBS/NatWest), EC Research > Centre, a > psychologist and others. Look forward to seeing you there. > > Regards, > Dave Birch. > > -- > -- David Birch, Director, Consult Hyperion > -- > -- tel +44 (0)1483 301793, fax +44 (0)1483 561657 > -- mail dave@chyp.com, web > -- > -- See you at the 2nd Annual Digital Transactions Forum in > Singapore > -- October 16th/17th 2002, see > / > > --- end forwarded text > > > -- > ----------------- > R.
